data.message: PAC was always my favorite and imo best of all time, but when someone argues Eminem I respect it, as being white guy I felt I actually was more in common with PAC, I'm sorry I never hated my mom so I couldn't relate with Eminem on that level, but he was a terrific rapper.

replies.message: PAC was good but he stuck to what he knew. He really didn't branch out of his comfort zone. Like Eminem did and still does to this day. He could release an album that's has every genre song in it and rap to it and still make millions.

Brinton Callahan stuck to what He knew? Pac spoke about life what was going on in the streets,oppression and the struggles of his ppl..

He broke boundaries and pissed millions of Ppl off..

Eminem is great at word play and and fast paced lyrics..but what he spits don't hold much depth 
Out of his Albums he has a mere few that are meaningful..

Rap is more than just keeping on the beat and making up your own Lego to fill in the gaps
Totally agree with what you said.  Eminem best ever heard making multiple syllables from words he is genius.

Brinton Callahan. 
Good point. PAC touched on every issue, but stayed to his genre.

He's no Genius its mere wit that he has..multiple syllables is mere word play

It's not rocket science

Cathy Dunbar 
Yeah but it takes a lot of skill to flow it like that, but I enjoyed Tupac lyrical prowess he just was really deep with his music don't get me wrong he had some shallow songs to sell records, but his best stuff wasn't even hits. Eminem is good time rap etc get us hyped up etc. Tupac make you think and ponder that's why I always consider he best, but music is subjective to a particular person.
Cathy Dunbar Eminem pissed millions off too. Expect he did it with lyrical wordplay.
u cant compare eminem en pac........eminem still have a long way to go to match pac's skills
u cant compare eminem en pac........eminem still have a long way to go to match pac's skills
Infinite,Sslp,Mmlp,the Eminem Show listening to these albums I feel like Eminem surpassed 2pac long time ago
Marshall ❤s his  mother huge family man
Marshall is real from rock bottom and his talent makes him introduced to dr dre and break the boundry and totally changed rap
Eminem addmited being inspired by Pac's 2pacalipse album. They both dope.
Eminem cannot be compared to PAC
BUT NOTORIOUS B.I.G IS THE BEST OF THEM ALL
I AGREE with that EMINEM can not be compared to 2Pac , EMINEM is the best, thats why they saying He's a RAP-GOD
